channel.title: Client background,
channel.description:
ive tried making my own picture for my client background,
put it as the same type and size as the old background,
put it in the same spot the old picture was,
i compile the client,
then it wont load,
it has steps on how i can fix the problem but there nothing to do with the background image,
how can i do this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2009, 03:46:25 am[/size][hr]dont worry i fixed it :)

item.title: Client background,
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

You need to change the name of the picture that the client loads, in class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.

Read full topic
